name: Purifier
desc: Blast a close-range stream of fire at your enemies.

name: Death Machine
desc: A handheld minigun that slowly increases accuracy over time. Press and hold the fire button conitnously to increase the firing speed.

name: War Machine
desc: Fully automatic grenade launcher with a devastating payload.

name: Tempest
desc: Hold the fire button to build up power and send a bolt of lightning at the target. Hits up to nine nearby targets.

name: Transform Shield
desc: Places an expandable shield. Microwave radiation continuously generates from the front, causing damage and slowing enemies within the area.

name: Sparrow
desc: Draw the Sparrow back for longer amounts of time to increase range and unleash powerful, blasting arrows.

name: Gravity Spikes
desc: Jump up and slam down to create an energy wave that will deal fatal damage to nearby enemies.

name: H.I.V.E
desc: Launch a trap of proximity mines that, when triggered, will release a swarm of nano drones that kill nearby enemies.

name: Annihilator
desc: High material penetration ammo at the cost of accuracy.

name: Shadow Blade
desc: Swiftly kill enemies at close range, while also detecting hostiles within the shroud of any smoke grenade.

name: Equalizer
desc: Dual integrated machine guns with built-in suppressors for close quarters combat.

name: Ballistic Shield
desc: Durable, transforming defensive shield with a built-in machine pistol.

name: Gravity Vortex Gun
desc: Launcher that fires vortex projectiles that distort gravity. When the vortex disappears, it causes explosive damage to everything in its path.

name: Bull Charge
desc: Charge forward and level all enemies in your path.

name: K9 Unit
desc: Call in a military dog to track an enemy by scent and attack them automatically.

name: Kinetic Armor
desc: Reactive armor that deflects enemy bullets away from the body. It does not protect against melee, headshot, incendiary or explosive damage. It will be disabled after deflecting a certain amount of damage.

name: TAK-5
desc: Heals and grants the allied team 50 extra HP.

name: Munitions Box
desc: Deploy a box of ammo and throwables for you and your teammates. Shoot at your own risk.

name: Reactor Core
desc: Emits a damaging radiation field that burns enemies, temporarily reducing their max health and preventing healing. The player using Reactor Core will also gain a defensive buff, reducing damage taken but using Reactor Core for too long will cause damage to the user.

name: Claw
desc: Rapid fire spread shot firearm with ricochet ballistic rounds. Aim down sights for more focused damage.

name: Ballista EM3
desc: An electromagnetic projectile launcher with high penetration capability. After equipped, the enemy will be outlined in red. Estimate the enemy's movement pattern and hold the fire button to build up power to deal fatal damage.

name: Tac-Deploy
desc: Deployable beacon that allows your teammates to redeploy to the surrounding area.

name: Misdirection Device
desc: Emits special sound waves that impair auditory functions, completely hiding the user's sound and causing enemies in range to hear fake noise sources.

name: Havoc
desc: Generate an electronic wave to destroy enemy deployable projectiles, disrupt enemies' mini-map information and some Scorestreaks.
